articles.title: SA stays on UK red list - eNCA
articles.description: British Transport Secretary Grant Shapps has announced South Africa is not one of the countries coming off the red list.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG - South Africa remains on the UK's travel red list of countries.
The country revised the list on Friday, removing eight countries, including Egypt and Kenya.
